name: Udochka
description:
Well, this one is a bit weird. I got my copy of a first ever printed comic by a friend of mine. It put me into mood for some deep thoughts. So as usual I picked up my guitar and started playing some improvisation on We Were Promised Jetpacks to keep the thoughts flowing. I was just sitting there alone playing, thinking and then I decided to capture the feeling of the moment (and to test some Unity lighting features as well).

And this came out.

You can interact with everything except the coffee and the cookies. And be sure to check out that friend of mine who's comic is featured (with permission) in this "experience".

It's all in Russian so be warned. But again, the imagery and animations are international so you can still take a look even if you don't know the language.
